entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character and head of Gryffindor house. He is described as hoping for an emptier stadium and less pressure on all concerned.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A member of Gryffindor house who has a problem with nerves. Harry had hoped that winning their final match last term might have cured it.

entities.name: cormac mclaggen
entities.description: A rejected player who saved four penalties out of five.

entities.name: keepers
entities.description: The players responsible for defending the goal. They are described as flying up to the goalhoops and being jeered by the crowd.

entities.name: crowd
entities.description: The people watching the trial of the Keepers. They are described as roaring and jeering in equal measure.

relationships.description: Harry glanced over at Ron, who was a delicate shade of green due to nerves.
Cormac McLaggen saved four penalties out of five.
